mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLE( ARTICLE_NO, TITLE, WRITER_ID, WRITER_NAME, CONTENT, ARTICLE_REGDATE ) VALUES( ARTICLE_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer_id}, #{writer_name}, #{content}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE ARTICLE SET READ_CNT=READ_CNT+1 WHERE ARTICLE_NO=#{article_no}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ARTICLE WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, ARTICLE.* FROM ARTICLE WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY ARTICLE_NO DESC ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ARTICLE WHERE CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ARTICLE WHERE WRITER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, ARTICLE.* FROM ARTICLE WHERE WRITER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY ARTICLE_NO DESC ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ARTICLE WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, ARTICLE.* FROM ARTICLE WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY ARTICLE_NO DESC ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
